text: QUERY PLANNING All the optimizations that we talked about before are still applicable in a distributed environment. — Predicate Pushdown — Early Projections — Optimal Join Orderings Distributed query optimization is even harder because it must consider the location of data in the cluster and data movement costs. | EZCMU-D8 ': | ~ — —— E »\'- 24 - Distributed OLAP Databases (CMU Databases Systems / Fall 2019)
